title: 'Succession' Hall of Fame: "Safe Room"
description:
The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by Joanna Robinson to discuss Season 2, Episode 4 of HBO's 'Succession,' titled "Safe Room."

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Joanna Robinson
Producer: Kyle Crichton
